title: An Act requiring automated external defibrillators at sporting events

abstracts.abstract: By Representatives Decker of Cambridge and Holmes of Boston, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2391) of Marjorie C. Decker for legislation to require automated external defibrillators at sporting events.  Public Health.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Health
Hearing scheduled for 04/02/2025 from 09:00 AM-02:00 PM in Gardner Auditorium
Reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Health Care Financing

related_entities.name: the committee on Health Care Financing

actions.description: Committee recommended bill ought to pass and referred to the committee on House Ways and Means

related_entities.name: committee on House Ways and Means
the committee on House Ways and Means

actions.description: Committee recommended ought to pass with an amendment, substituting therefor a bill with the same title, see H4993
Referred to the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling with the amendment pending

related_entities.name: committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling with the amendment pending

actions.description: Committee reported that the matter be placed in the Orders of the Day for the next sitting for a second reading with the amendment pending
